g1.title: @jaeger - Distributed Tracing System
g1.description: Implement @jaeger operator with span creation, trace collection, performance monitoring, and distributed tracing analysis

g2.title: @zipkin - Trace Aggregation & Analysis
g2.description: Implement @zipkin operator with trace collection, span annotation, service dependency mapping, and latency analysis

g3.title: @grafana - Dashboard Integration & Visualization
g3.description: Implement @grafana operator with dashboard creation, data source management, alerting, and real-time visualization

g4.title: @temporal - Workflow Orchestration Engine
g4.description: Implement @temporal operator for workflow management, activity execution, distributed task coordination, and state management
